title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 18 August 2012 - XWiki

20:51 <sdumitriu> vmassol: Ping  
20:53 <sdumitriu> vmassol: How do I disable the checks that the XAR plugin does on the XML files?  
20:54 <sdumitriu> Ideally I'd like to disable just one document, but <configuration><excludes> doesn't seem to be taken into account  
20:55 <vmassol> sdumitriu: hi, I don't recall the details but you can check VerifyMojo in commons tools xar plugin  
20:55 <vmassol> exclude is probably not coded  
20:55 <sdumitriu> I did, there doesn't seem to be support for it  
20:55 <vmassol> the reason is that we didn't have a need  
20:56 <vmassol> gtg dinner time  
20:56 <sdumitriu> Thanks, bye  
21:32 <vmassol> has quit  
22:15 <mflorea> has quit
